name: Mine Check
description:
In Mine Check, you will have to mark the number of mines located around every '?' box. The game is based on the classic game Minesweeper, but instead of avoiding mines depending on numbers, you will have to place numbers depending on mines.

Mine Check has two game modes: 

  • 18 levels with a grid of 3x3 and a timer that decreases.
  • Randomly generated levels with three size configurations.
PLATFORMS

Browser.

PC CONTROLS:

Mouse left buttons - Click.

MOBILE CONTROLS

Screen touch - Click.

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment or a message to me explaining what happened.
